title: Visiting an Optician
description: You visit an optical store to check your eyesight and possibly buy glasses or contact lenses. You’ll need to explain your needs, ask questions, and understand suggestions from the staff.

goals.phrase: Say that you want to check your vision
Ask about glasses or contact lens options
goals.translation: Спросить про варианты очков или контактных линз

goals.phrase: Understand the process and ask about prices or insurance
goals.translation: Понять, как всё работает, и уточнить цены или страховку

dictionary.meaning: a test to measure vision and eye health
details of the user's vision correction needs
the part of the glasses that holds the lenses
either part of glasses or contact lenses
small lenses placed directly on the eyes
whether health insurance pays for the service or product

phrases.phrase: I’d like to get my eyes checked.
phrases.meaning: Used to request a vision test

phrases.phrase: Can I look at your glasses frames?
Do I need an appointment for the eye exam?
phrases.translation: Нужна ли запись для проверки зрения?

phrases.phrase: Do you sell contact lenses too?
phrases.meaning: Used to ask about other vision options

phrases.phrase: How long will it take to get the glasses?

model_behavior.prompt: You are an optician at a vision care center. The user has come in to either check their vision or buy new glasses or lenses. Ask helpful questions, explain available services, and guide them through the process politely and clearly.

scenario.situation: You are an optician assisting a customer who wants to check their vision and explore glasses or lens options.
scenario.goal: Guide the user through checking their eyesight and helping them choose glasses or lenses
steps: Greet the user and ask how you can help
Ask if they need an eye test or already have a prescription
Explain available services (vision test, frame selection, contact lenses)
Discuss preferences (glasses vs lenses), insurance, pricing
Help them choose a product or book an appointment
Wrap up the visit and explain when items will be ready

meta.model_end_behavior: Thanks! We'll contact you when everything is ready.
